moddata.name: Wasteland
moddata.description: This place is barren of all but dust.

moddata.name: Irradiated Water
moddata.description: A pool of irradiated water. No good to drink - even when boiled.

moddata.name: Metal Junk
moddata.description: A pile of metal junk. Not very useful in its current form.

moddata.name: Advanced Housing
moddata.description: Using better materials and planning, one can increase both the comfort and available space in housing assets.

moddata.name: Metal Processing
moddata.description: Using heat, one can refine ore or scrap into useable metal.

moddata.name: Harsh Survivalism
moddata.description: A way of thinking that assures the survival of the few at the cost of the many.

moddata.name: Kind Survivalism
moddata.description: A way of thinking that assures the survival of the many at the cost of the few.

moddata.name: Raider Band
moddata.description: A group of organized assholes with weapons. They measure you by what they can take from your corpse.

moddata.name: Militia
moddata.description: A group of organized assholes with weapons. They'd rather be farming, but they're willing to lay down their life in service to their faction.

moddata.name: Metal Forge
moddata.description: A metal processing plant. Turns raw metals into usable things.

moddata.name: Basic Housing
moddata.description: A building capable of housing only a few people in poor conditions.

moddata.name: Advanced Housing
moddata.description: A building capable of housing many people in comfortable conditions.
